name: S.P.R.A.A.T.A.
description:
A short Gameboy style 3d platformer made for GBJAM9.

(The name stands for Small Person Runs Away And Then Ascends.)

The movement is intentionally janky, as this game is meant to be broken spectacularly, to allow for some crazy fast times on the levels. If you wish, send me your crazy speedruns at BurntPudding#5950 on discord!

(Keyboard controls are Z/X or J/K to rotate, WASD or arrow keys to move, space to jump. The shift key is used whenever it says press start.)

(Controller controls are Start and Select to rotate, Dpad to move, and A to jump. (thats the south button if you're not using an xbox controller.))
